Options.OPTION[Tree_Controller.Tree_Cont: Deciduous trees use Dead Model during Winter
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Tree_Controll: Will temporarily make all non-lumber industry deciduous trees use the dead model and pause growth during winter.
Disable tree growth for the entire map except for lumber industry.
Sets of seasonal colors for Trees and Wild bushes. Vanilla is the base game. Yenyang's is my curated colors. Custom uses CSV files in the mod folder.
After confirmation this will reload CSV files.
Removes Tree Controller mod components and resets tree and bush model states. Only necessary during Winter and very end of Autumn. Must use reset button to undo setting change.
Options.WARNING[Tree_Controller.Tree_Con: Remove Tree Controller mod components and reset tree and bush model states?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Tree_Controll: Permanently removes all trees and plants from the map. It keeps any foliage owned by buildings, parks, or roads. This action cannot be undone.
Options.WARNING[Tree_Controller.Tree_Con: Remove all trees and plants not attached to existing objects?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[Tree_Controll: After confirmation this will reset Tree Controller Settings.

When multiple Tree Ages are selected, one will be selected using this option. Equal Distribution is just a random selection. Forest Distribution randomly selects using the editor's approximation for a forest.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[building-: Selects every tree in a whole building or network. You cannot change type of trees in networks.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[single-tr: Selects a single tree in a building, network, or on the map. You cannot change type of trees in networks.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[radius]: Selects every tree in a radius including those in buildings, networks, or on the map. You should avoid changing type of trees in networks.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[whole-map: Selects all trees in every building, network, or on the map. Be careful how you use this. Right click to apply. You should avoid changing type of trees in networks.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[child]: Essentially a Sapling. First stage of tree growth.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[teen]: A young tree. Second stage of tree growth.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[adult]: A mature tree but not the largest size. Third stage of tree growth.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[elderly]: The oldest and largest sized trees. Fourth stage of tree growth.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[dead]: A bare, leafless tree. Final stage of tree growth. Will eventually cycle back into a child (sapling) tree.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[clear-age: Either selects all or none of the ages depending on your current selection. Having none selected will always default to adult.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[change-ag: A custom tool for changing the ages of existing trees.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[change-pr: A custom tool for changing the type and/or age of existing trees.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[wild-deci: Alder, Birch, London Plane, Linden, Hickory, Chestnut, and Oak. Does not include Apple and Poplar.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[random-ro: Will randomly rotate the tree or bush as the tree or bush is moved to different positions on the map.
YY_TREE_CONTROLLER_DESCRIPTION[custom-se: Hold Ctrl to select or unselect multiple types of trees using the toolbar menu. Then hold Ctrl and click this button to save a custom set. Once a set has been saved, click this button to select that set. Hold Ctrl while switching themes to maintain the custom set.

Hold Ctrl to select or unselect multiple types of trees using the toolbar menu. Then hold Ctrl and click this button to save a custom set. Once a set has been saved, click this button to select that set. Hold Ctrl while switching themes to maintain the custom set.

Hold Ctrl to select or unselect multiple types of trees using the toolbar menu. Then hold Ctrl and click this button to save a custom set. Once a set has been saved, click this button to select that set. Hold Ctrl while switching themes to maintain the custom set.

Hold Ctrl to select or unselect multiple types of trees using the toolbar menu. Then hold Ctrl and click this button to save a custom set. Once a set has been saved, click this button to select that set. Hold Ctrl while switching themes to maintain the custom set.

Hold Ctrl to select or unselect multiple types of trees using the toolbar menu. Then hold Ctrl and click this button to save a custom set. Once a set has been saved, click this button to select that set. Hold Ctrl while switching themes to maintain the custom set.
